title: Game got unplayable for me because of screen freezing - pls help!
body:
Hey guys, I have a problem and hope you can help me!
Since atleast a month or more, my screen has been freezing while I play LoL. It happens only during LoL! 
During the screen freeze I can´t see whats happening, so if I click randomly around during the freeze my charater is walking to the position I clicked (but I 
can´t see where I click because of the freeze...) The freeze is about 2-5 sec long.
The freez happens mostly during teamfights but sometimes also randomly. This makes the game unplayale for me, because standing still or running blind into the enemy team as an adc doesn´t really win you games.
First I thought it is because I have to less fps. I only had around 60 fps. But now I boosted it up to constant 100 fps or more and the screen still freezes.
So I asked a few of my friends if they have the same problems and alot of them told me they have similar lags since the new client came out.
After this information, I activated the low spec mode that you can select in the client - didn´t helped
Than I checked the box in the settings that closes the client as soon as you get ingame - didn´t helped

I don´t know what to do anymore and I would really apreciate your help. It would also help if you would jsut leave a coment telling me if you have the same problem as I have.

aulustillman

replies.body:
Low spec mode will usually assist with pc stress in the client and not in-game.  It does sound like this freezing might be an fps issue, but run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) just in case you might be suffering packet loss.  

Try out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide as well in case there are other factors for frame drops like bad game files.

Otherwise, let me know what the log reader discovers.

I just aplyed the log reader to some of my reacent logs and it discovered package lost, but non of the recomend solutions coul help me because I ever already tried it or am doing it at the moment... are there any other solutions?

You might want to check your logs here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743
It sounds very similar to a packet loss issue which several people (including myself) have while playing, though I am fairly certain that my ISP is to blame.
